title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 430.4 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 430.4 - Location

State Regulations
(a) Records shall
be made available at the main office of the Workers' Compensation Board, which
is located at: 180 Livingston Street, Brooklyn, NY 11248
(b) Whenever practicable, records shall be
made available at a district office most convenient to a data subject. The
district offices are located at: (1)
100

Broadway Menands, Albany, NY 12241; (2)
113 State Street, Binghamton, NY
13901; (3)

State Office Building, 125 Main Street, Buffalo, NY 14203; (4)
155 Main Street West. Rochester, NY
14614; (5)

State Office Building, Syracuse, NY 13202; and
(6)
175

Fulton Avenue, Hempstead, NY 11550. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
430.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
